content: hellowhoisthis
whereisspacebar.justgotthisdamnphoneihatemygrandchildrenforbuying
oki mlearning how to do this. Don't know hpwyo fix errorsyet.

Ok I am talking now to the microphone to type hello type no delete it and delete it stop writing delete how do you delete on no delete delete delete yourself theres really no way to delete it damn it i hate this thing
Ok I'm good now.
Are you a telemarketer? I don't have time for your shit. I have to go to Best Buy in an hour to buy some gift cards for a Nigerian Prince.
Well I guess either way I'm bored and retired and now I'm gonna make that your problem. Do you want to hear about my time in the army?
Commie bastard. You're gonna listen anyways.
Glad to know you're a patriot. Now listen up.
This one time, at camp...
its a GREAT story, what do you mean!?
Sorry, what were we talking about again...?
I dont know what the hell you're talking about, son
I dont understand anything you kids say anymore
That some kinda new LINGO?
You young folk have ruined english and you make no goddamn sense
I'm tired of you youngins and your nonsense
Stay in school kid, you're forgetting how to speak proper English
anyways...
Can I ask you something?
Answer me this.
By the way...
I gotta ask...
Hey...
Humor me real quick
I didn't fight in the war to take shit from you
You're the reason America is going to shit
Well maybe you should just pull yourself up by your bootstraps!
People these days have no respect for their elders
You need to watch your tone, mister
I'm going to call your mother so she can put soap in your mouth.
I can tell you were not properly disciplined as a child
You are a disappointment to our country
You're a good-for-nothing hippie, I'm sure of it
Eat my shorts
Kids these days...
Does anybody have respect these days?
I'm going to slide into your grandmother's dms if you don't straighten up
That's it. I'm taking you out of the will.
You're more annoying than my dead wife.
Texting you is more painful than my hemorrhoids
Maybe if you'd stop spending so much money on avocado toast you'd be in a better financial state!
You suck. And your generation is a bunch of hippie freeloaders. And I hate you.
Come visit me at the nursing home one of these days!
Bless you kid, you deserve a hard candy
You give me hope for the next generation
If only every young American was just like you, then I wouldn't worry so much
You've got a bright future ahead of you, kid
You're a good kid. I ought to take you out to a ball game sometime
You're good-natured. That's hard to come by nowadays
The staff at the nursing home would love you if you ever visited
You know how to show respect. Good on ya, kid. You should've joined the army.
You'd make a fine soilder in the army with that attitude
You're a mighty fine kid. I'll put you in my will.
You one of the WOKE folk?
I left a message on your answering machine. Why didn't you call me back yet?
I'm still hip, right?
Can you remind me to schedule my annual colonoscopy?
Do you want to be in my will?
Do you like my new shoes? SEND PHOTO
What do you think of this new necklace my granddaughter bought me? SEND PHOTO
Now that my wife's dead, do you think I should download Tinder?
Would you ever want to meet up for Home Town Buffet? I could teach you how to woo the ladies
Would you want to play bingo at the community center with me? I'll sneak in some scotch for the both of us
I keep hearing about this new 'Doja Cat' character. She seems like a real up-and-comer. Should I buy her tape?
